Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
16.10.2014 SH SCR19241 BXA305A Changed lenght of CLNT901_CONTRACTNUMBER for output to XML from 15 to 25
08.08.2014 GB SCR19065 BXA305A: removed part YY of CLNT901_DATESIGNED from <contract_number>
31.07.2014 SH SCR19031 Changed update BXA900.PI.REPORTTYPE_STRING (removed test on TMIN_FREQUENCY=M)
22.05.2014 GB SCR18920 BXA305B: Chnaged value of <amount_excl_vat>, <amount_vat>, <amount_incl_vat>, BXA305C: Changed totals
23.06.2013 GB SCR18228 BXA305A: Chnaged range of ADMN selection
04.02.2013 SH SCR17923 Extended test to set PI.FREQUENCY = M with test on PI.FREQUENCY <> D
22.02.2012 SH SCR17116 BXA305A Changed selection of HOFF (for admin 13/14)
30.05.2011 SH SCR16486 Changed updated CSQY_ADMNO = 0 in ADMN_ADMNO_RATES
11.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
11.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURH by CUHA
19.04.2011 GB SCR16390 Replaced GSET_MARKCODE, GSET_HUSR_ID
by GSBU_MARKCODE, GSBU_HUSR_ID
15.04.2011 GB SCR16371 Eliminate GNRL_LANGUAGE
15.03.2011 GB SCR16293 Added invoice creator part for the end the BXA305A
12.01.2011 SH SCR16129 Added update REPA_TAMINOSTYLESHEET
23.11.2010 SH SCR16007 Added PI.FREQUENCY
09.02.2010 SH SCR15321 BXA305A Added <due_date>
19.08.2009 GB SCR14788 Changed length of HOFF_NAME
04.06.2009 GB SCR14665 Extended the part BXA305A
13.02.2009 GB SCR14395 Added set TMIT_BOOKVIASCHEDULE
23.10.2007 MKO SCR13024 change "invoice_number" for PL only
10.10.2007 SH SCR12988 Extended HUSR_NAME support from alpha 25 to 40
04.10.2007 SH SCR12952 BXA305C Added GSET_USER_ID(266)
08.08.2007 SH SCR12778 BXA305 Changed writing of <contract_number> and <nip>;
BXA305B changed updates of <text> to use strings in GB instead of PL language
14.06.2007 SH SCR12604 BXA305A Added <contract_number>; BXA305B
Extended update of <percentage_vat>
08.05.2007 SH SCR12501 BXA305B Remove trailing zeors from v.RATE
08.05.2007 SH SCR12501 BXA305B Removed use of CURH_EXCHGRATEDAILY where
CURH_STARTDATE = PI.DATE
11.04.2007 SH SCR12439 BXA305B Moved writing foreign currency below writing the
LDID rows to XML; Added test on GNRL_CODE = PL to write total amounts in words
28.03.2006 SH SCR12362 Added GSET_YESNO(245) = Y to write foreign currency
clients rows
14.02.2005 SH SCR7763 Added missing TMIT/TMIN_DATE selections
09.02.2005 SH SCR7783 BXA305C Added <signature userid> = CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT
14.12.2004 SH SCR7503 Replaced client amount by heller amount fields; changed
SORT of TMIT
02.12.2004 SH SCR7431 Obtain CODE with CODE_TYPE = 66 instead 65 to get
description for <month_year>
08.11.2004 SH SCR7302 <month_year>, get month from table CODE (ID=65) now
13.09.2004 Maciek SCR 6995 - correction for TOTAL_VAT_TXT
18.08.2004 SH SCR6812 BXA305B Removed hardcode <pkwiu>'65.22.10'</pkwiu>
by <pkwiu>TMIN_PKWIU'</pkwiu>
29.07.2004 SH SCR6686 BXA305B Removed TMIN_LDGR_NO < 8000000 from selection
of TMIN rows
27.07.2004 SH SCR6649 Get heller user phone and fax with GB033 now
08.07.2004 SH SCR6604 BXA305C Added new tags <total_interest_vat> and
<total_interest_incl_vat> and changed contents of old tags
15.04.2004 SH SCR5995 Store content of <invoice_number> to TMIT_INVOICENO
14.04.2004 SH SCR5947 BXA305A Moved fetch on table CSQY before REPA will be
- stored, because CSQY_LASTUSEDNUMBER will be used to update REAP; BXA305C
- extended calc of <total_interest> with - sum(TMIN_TAXAMOUNTC)
06.04.2004 SH SCR5894 BXA305B Changed selection of TMIN rows to TMIN_LDGER_NO
- < 8000000, see SCR for details
1. BXA305A --> Changed mask for <nip> to ###-##-##-###
2. BXA305B --> Obtain LDID to get <text> also in general language, if no row
exists in client language
3. BXA305C --> Uses code description for <heller_group>
26.03.2004 SH SCR5820 Added "type=&TMIT_MONTHLYINVOICETYPE to
- PI.REPORTTYPESTRING (parameter for BXA900)
24.03.2004 SH SCR5790 Changed SORT of TLIT rows, new field has to be used
- TMIT_MONTHLYINVOICETYPE, see SCR for details
05.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
13.02.2004 SH SCR5527 BXA305C Restructured XML structure regarding to new
- stylesheet
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
-- uses for translations
-- Store system language, uses to switch back to system language if report
-- language <> system language
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- This SubTask selected every TMIT row with TMIT_APPROVED = 'Y'
-- and calls the SubTask 'Handle MONTHLY_INVOICE_TOTALS'.
-- The SubTask runs in one transaction. We only need this SubTask
-- 'LoopHandle MONTHLY_INVOICE_TOTALS' to run without
-- transaction, to get a sequencenumber per CLIENT. Otherwise the
-- relevant row (REPA) in table 'Sequencenumber' is locked during
-- the transaction. Other programs which need numbers from the same
-- record (REPA) wait for locked and stops.
-- Reset
-- Get Journalnumber out of the Transaction in the task below
-- Handle ONE client
-- Reset virtuals
-- Set to client language
-- Store a line in the ReportArchiv
-- Write XML-HEADER and XML-FOOTER
.. prepare invoice number uses in BXA305 Header and for update of TMIT_INVOICENO
... set v.USERID
... prepare heller user phone, uses in BXA305C Footer
-- Build final XML File
-- Copy the header file to final file. If we don't do that, AS/400 will choose
- system default fo CCSID (EBCDIC) if we later on append with cat >>
- to a non-existing (new) final file ...
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Delete the different generated files
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Final update to TMIT if XML was produced
-- Set back to system language
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
- for client
-- Tag <nip>
... if GNRL_CODE = PL then the string has to be written in format UUU-UU-UU-UUU
-- Tag <contract_number>
--if CLNT203_OFFICE = RO and CLNT101_ADMNO = 2 and GSET_YESNO (3333) = Y
-- Totals
-- Write totals to XML, if more then 1 TMIN was written to XML
-- 1. One blank row
-- 2. Write totals to XML
-- Totals uses in BXA305 Footer
-- Reset virtuals
-- Calculate totals
-- Obtain LDID in CLNT201_LANGUAGE to write related <text>
-- if no LDID in CLNT201_LANGUAGE exists, obtain LDID in GNRL_LANGUAGE
-- to write related <text>; If there exists also no LDID in GNR_LANGUAGE, then
-- LDGR_NAME will be used for <text>, see T.S. of Child task
-- Build final temp. XML file for BXA305B - Detail lines
-- Firstable copy the first partial XML file to the traget file, if we don't do
-- that, AS/400 will choose system default fo CCSID (EBCDIC) if we later
-- append with cat >> to a non-existing (new) XML file ...
-- Write LDGR_NAME to <text> if no LDID rows exists in client language
- and general language
-- One extra row with the exchange rate in case of ING <> client currency
... use exchange rate where CURH_STARTDATE max <= TMIT_DATE
... remove trailing zeros of v.RATE
-- TRUE if LDID row exists, otherwise LDID will be obtained in general language
-- and if also no row exists LDGR_NAME has to be written to <text>, see T.S.
-- Text part
-- Amount part
-- Convert amounts into textstring (Only if GNRL_CODE = PL)
